Detailed Description

Substitution component

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

Initialized with a controller, accepts inputs and returns them with specially-formatted substitution strings (e.g. "%(FIRSTNAME)") replaced by the appropriate value for the session.

Substitution strings in the format %([function name] arg1 arg2) with [SPACE] to be replaced by ' ' when the args are evaluated Substitution string examples: %(FIRSTNAME) %(RELATIVE_DATETIME 3[SPACE]months[SPACE]ago)

All functions are implemented in the Substitutions class. To add more, add the functions to that class, or subclass Substitutions and then initialize the new class as $this->substitutions in the startup method. All functions will only receive the current session id.
